outputs.output_descr: UNDP Belize has fund raised to expand its COMPACT Small Grants Programme. Approved OAK FOundation funds will be utilized to CO-finance COMPACT grants. Grant funding target community based organization and non governmental stakeholders of the Belize Barrier Reef Complex. Activities support the protection of the world heritage site.

project_descr: OAK funding to be re-granted as co-financing to local COMPACT projects. Programme focuses on local stakeholders of the Belize Barrier Reef Complex.
